Description: Sliver of flattened handle of an Akanthian pottery transport amphora. Clay coarse, micaceous, red-brown; substantial dark grey core. Circular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 173, 1. For the type see Y. Garlan BCH 130 (2006), 277.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0045)
